Title: Waging war against Pakistan
Description: Making war against Pakistan or attempting to wrest any part of Pakistan from the possession of Pakistan
Punishment: Death

Title: Conspiracy to wage war against Pakistan
Description: Conspiracy to wage war against Pakistan
Punishment: Imprisonment for life or rigorous imprisonment for 10 years

Title: Attending hostilities against Pakistan
Description: Knowingly joining or associating with any persons in arms against Pakistan
Punishment: Imprisonment for 7 years

Title: Public mischief by destroying or damaging public property
Description: Destroying or damaging public property with the intention of causing, or knowing it to be likely to cause, common injury
Punishment: Imprisonment for 2 years or fine or both

Title: Public mischief by rendering any public way impassable
Description: Making or rendering any public way, bridge, navigable river or channel, or navigable inland water, impassable or less safe for traveling or conveying property
Punishment: Imprisonment for 6 months or fine or both

Title: Disturbing religious assemblies
Description: Intentionally insulting any religion or religious beliefs of any class of citizens of Pakistan, or disrupting any religious assembly
Punishment: Imprisonment for 2 years or fine or both

Title: Obstructing lawful apprehension of persons
Description: Intentionally obstructing or resisting any person lawfully employed in apprehending another person
Punishment: Imprisonment for 7 years or fine or both

Title: Escaping from custody or confinement
Description: Escaping from custody or confinement
Punishment: Imprisonment for 7 years or fine or both

Title: Attempt to rescue or harbor an escaped person
Description: Attempting to rescue or harboring an escaped person
Punishment: Imprisonment for 3 years or fine or both

Title: Offering resistance to or defeating execution of any lawful process
Description: Offering resistance to, or intentionally obstructing the execution of, any lawful process
Punishment: Imprisonment for 2 years or fine or both

Title: Obstructing public servant in discharge of public functions
Description: Obstructing any public servant in the discharge of his public functions
Punishment: Imprisonment for 3 years or fine or both

Title: Neglecting public duty as a public servant
Description: Neglecting to perform a public duty as a public servant
Punishment: Imprisonment for 6 months or fine or both

Title: Disobedience to order duly promulgated by public servant
Description: Disobeying any lawful and reasonable order duly promulgated by a public servant
Punishment: Imprisonment for 6 months or fine or both

Title: Abetment of mutiny by public servant
Description: Abetment of mutiny by any public servant
Punishment: Imprisonment for life or rigorous imprisonment for 10 years

Title: Mutiny by officer, soldier, sailor, or airman
Description: Mutiny by an officer, soldier, sailor, or airman in the Pakistan Army, Navy or Air Force
Punishment: Death

Title: Mutiny by non-commissioned officer, soldier, sailor, or airman
Description: Mutiny by a non-commissioned officer, soldier, sailor, or airman in the Pakistan Army, Navy or Air Force
Punishment: Imprisonment for life or rigorous imprisonment for 10 years

Title: Abetment of mutiny by non-commissioned officer, soldier, sailor, or airman
Description: Abetment of mutiny by a non-commissioned officer, soldier, sailor, or airman in the Pakistan Army, Navy or Air Force
Punishment: Imprisonment for 7 years

Title: Attempt to seduce officer, soldier, sailor, or airman from duty
Description: Attempting to seduce an officer, soldier, sailor, or airman in the Pakistan Army, Navy or Air Force from his duty
Punishment: Imprisonment for 7 years

Title: Acts of gross insubordination by soldier, sailor, or airman
Description: Acts of gross insubordination by a soldier, sailor, or airman in the Pakistan Army, Navy or Air Force
Punishment: Imprisonment for 7 years

Title: Mutiny by officer of Indian Navy
Description: Mutiny by an officer of the Indian Navy
Punishment: Death

Title: Abetment of mutiny by officer of Indian Navy
Description: Abetment of mutiny by an officer of the Indian Navy
Punishment: Imprisonment for life

Title: Abetment of mutiny by sailor or marine of Indian Navy
Description: Abetment of mutiny by a sailor or marine of the Indian Navy
Punishment: Imprisonment for 7 years

Title: Mutiny by a member of the armed forces of any country cooperating with Pakistan
Description: Mutiny by a member of the armed forces of any country cooperating with Pakistan
Punishment: Death

Title: Abetment of mutiny by a member of the armed forces of any country cooperating with Pakistan
Description: Abetment of mutiny by a member of the armed forces of any country cooperating with Pakistan
Punishment: Imprisonment for life

Title: Public servant disobeying the direction of the Government of Pakistan
Description: Public servant disobeying the direction of the Government of Pakistan lawfully communicated to him
Punishment: Imprisonment for 2 years or fine or both

Title: Abetment of offence by public servant
Description: Abetment of an offence by a public servant
Punishment: Imprisonment for 2 years or fine or both

Title: Public servant framing an innocent person
Description: Public servant framing an innocent person for an offence punishable with imprisonment for life or rigorous imprisonment for 10 years
Punishment: Imprisonment for life

Title: Public servant fabricating false evidence
Description: Public servant fabricating false evidence with intent to cause innocent person to be sentenced to death
Punishment: Death

Title: Public servant fabricating false evidence
Description: Public servant fabricating false evidence with intent to cause any person to be convicted of an offence punishable with imprisonment for life or rigorous imprisonment for 10 years
Punishment: Imprisonment for 7 years

Title: Public servant fabricating false evidence
Description: Public servant fabricating false evidence for the purpose of causing himself or any other person to be protected from punishment
Punishment: Imprisonment for 3 years or fine or both

Title: Public servant abetting false evidence
Description: Public servant abetting the forging or fabricating of false evidence
Punishment: Imprisonment for 3 years or fine or both

Title: Public servant suppressing evidence
Description: Public servant suppressing evidence of an offence
Punishment: Imprisonment for 3 years or fine or both

Title: Public servant omitting to make report of an offence
Description: Public servant omitting to make a report of an offence committed in his presence
Punishment: Imprisonment for 2 years or fine or both

Title: Abetment of offence by public servant
Description: Abetment of an offence by a public servant if the offence abetted is committed
Punishment: Imprisonment for 2 years or fine or both

Title: Punishment of abetment if person abetted does act with different intention from that of abettor
Description: Punishment for abetment if the person abetted does the act with a different intention from that of the abettor
Punishment: Same punishment as for the offence actually committed

Title: Attempt to commit offences
Description: Attempt to commit an offence punishable by death or imprisonment for life
Punishment: Imprisonment for half the period for which the complete offence might have been punished

Title: Attempt to commit offences
Description: Attempt to commit an offence punishable with imprisonment for more than 7 years
Punishment: Imprisonment for half the period for which the complete offence might have been punished

Title: Attempt to commit offences
Description: Attempt to commit an offence punishable with imprisonment for 7 years or less
Punishment: Imprisonment for 2 years or fine or both

Title: Abetment of attempt to commit offences
Description: Abetment of an attempt to commit an offence
Punishment: Imprisonment for half the period for which the abettor would be punishable if the attempt had been completed

Title: Abetment of an offence punishable with imprisonment for life or rigorous imprisonment for 10 years
Description: Abetment of an offence punishable with imprisonment for life or rigorous imprisonment for 10 years
Punishment: Imprisonment for life or rigorous imprisonment for 10 years

Title: Harbouring offender
Description: Harbouring or concealing or assisting in the escape of any person whom he knows or has reason to believe to be guilty of an offence punishable with imprisonment for life or rigorous imprisonment for 10 years
Punishment: Imprisonment for 3 years or fine or both

Title: Harbouring offender
Description: Harbouring or concealing or assisting in the escape of any person whom he knows or has reason to believe to be guilty of an offence punishable with imprisonment for more than 7 years
Punishment: Imprisonment for 2 years or fine or both

Title: Harbouring offender
Description: Harbouring or concealing or assisting in the escape of any person whom he knows or has reason to believe to be guilty of an offence punishable with imprisonment for 7 years or less
Punishment: Imprisonment for 1 year or fine or both

Title: Public servant harbouring or concealing offenders
Description: Public servant knowingly harbouring or concealing a person guilty of an offence
Punishment: Imprisonment for 2 years or fine or both

Title: Public servant abetting the harbouring or concealing of offenders
Description: Public servant abetting the harbouring or concealing of a person guilty of an offence
Punishment: Imprisonment for 2 years or fine or both

Title: Waging war against Government of India
Description: Waging war against the Government of India
Punishment: Death

Title: Conspiracy to wage war against Government of India
Description: Conspiring to wage war against the Government of India
Punishment: Imprisonment for life or rigorous imprisonment for 10 years

Title: Collecting arms etc., by an unlawful assembly
Description: Collecting arms or ammunition or receiving or possessing or distributing or disposing of arms or ammunition in furtherance of an unlawful assembly
Punishment: Imprisonment for 7 years or fine or both

Title: Attending on unlawful assembly armed
Description: Going armed with any deadly weapon to or being armed with any deadly weapon at, an unlawful assembly
Punishment: Imprisonment for 3 years or fine or both

Title: Hiring, engaging, or employing persons to be armed on unlawful assembly
Description: Hiring, engaging, or employing persons to go armed with any deadly weapon to an unlawful assembly
Punishment: Imprisonment for 2 years or fine or both

Title: Punishment for assault for committing robbery
Description: Committing assault in order to prepare for or to commit robbery
Punishment: Imprisonment for 10 years and fine

Title: Mischief by fire or by explosive substance with intent to destroy human life
Description: Committing mischief by fire or by any explosive substance with intent to cause the death of any person
Punishment: Death

Title: Mischief by fire or by explosive substance with intent to cause damage to property
Description: Committing mischief by fire or by any explosive substance with intent to cause damage to any property
Punishment: Imprisonment for life or rigorous imprisonment for 10 years

Title: Making mutiny or conspiracy to mutiny among prisoners
Description: Inciting or attempting to incite the mutiny of, or joining in any mutiny by, prisoners
Punishment: Imprisonment for life

Title: Abetting mutiny or conspiracy to mutiny among prisoners
Description: Abetting the mutiny of, or conspiracy to mutiny by, prisoners
Punishment: Imprisonment for 7 years or fine or both

Title: Trespassing on public works for certain purposes
Description: Trespassing on any public work in execution, completion or repair, with intent to obstruct or hinder the lawful progress thereof
Punishment: Imprisonment for 2 years or fine or both

Title: Obstructing or injuring lawful employment on public works
Description: Obstructing or injuring any person lawfully employed on a public work
Punishment: Imprisonment for 6 months or fine or both

Title: Maliciously damaging public property
Description: Maliciously damaging or destroying public property
Punishment: Imprisonment for 5 years or fine or both

Title: Offering bribe to a public servant
Description: Offering any undue gratification to a public servant, as motive or reward for doing or refraining from doing any official act
Punishment: Imprisonment for 3 years or fine or both

Title: Abetment of taking undue gratification by a public servant
Description: Abetting the taking of undue gratification by a public servant
Punishment: Imprisonment for 3 years or fine or both

Title: Public servant taking undue gratification for exercise of official functions
Description: Public servant taking undue gratification for the exercise of the official functions of his office
Punishment: Imprisonment for 7 years or fine or both

Title: Abetment of taking undue gratification for exercise of official functions
Description: Abetting the taking of undue gratification for the exercise of the official functions of a public servant
Punishment: Imprisonment for 4 years or fine or both

Title: Public servant taking reward for doing what is his duty
Description: Public servant taking reward for doing what he is legally bound to do without reward
Punishment: Imprisonment for 1 year or fine or both

Title: Abetment of taking reward for doing what is his duty
Description: Abetting the taking of reward for doing what he is legally bound to do without reward
Punishment: Imprisonment for 6 months or fine or both

Title: Personating a public servant
Description: Knowingly personating a public servant, or wearing the garb or carrying any token of any public servant with intent to deceive any person
Punishment: Imprisonment for 3 years or fine or both

Title: Unlawfully assuming public office
Description: Knowingly and without lawful authority taking upon oneself the office of a public servant
Punishment: Imprisonment for 2 years or fine or both

Title: Falsely certifying public document
Description: Fabricating or knowingly and fraudulently altering or causing to be fabricated or altered a public document
Punishment: Imprisonment for 7 years or fine or both

Title: Using document forged or falsely altered
Description: Knowingly using a document which has been fraudulently or dishonestly made or altered
Punishment: Imprisonment for 3 years or fine or both

Title: Public servant disobeying law with intent to cause injury to any person
Description: Public servant knowingly disobeying the law with intent to cause injury to any person
Punishment: Imprisonment for 2 years or fine or both

Title: Fraudulently making false statement in any declaration which is by law receivable as evidence
Description: Making a false statement in any declaration which is by law receivable as evidence knowing or believing it to be false
Punishment: Imprisonment for 3 years or fine or both

Title: Cheating
Description: Cheating and thereby dishonestly inducing delivery of property or any valuable security
Punishment: Imprisonment for 7 years or fine or both

Title: Manipulating accounts to cause loss
Description: Making or falsifying, or causing to be made or falsified, any account or statement of accounts of any public officer or public company
Punishment: Imprisonment for 10 years or fine or both

Title: Abetment of forgery
Description: Abetting the forgery of a document or record
Punishment: Imprisonment for the same term as for the offence abetted

Title: Giving false evidence
Description: Giving false evidence in any stage of a proceeding in any Court or before any person authorized by law to receive evidence
Punishment: Imprisonment for 3 years or fine or both

Title: Fabricating false evidence
Description: Fabricating false evidence for the purpose of being used in any stage of a proceeding in any Court or before any person authorized by law to receive evidence
Punishment: Imprisonment for 7 years or fine or both

Title: Tampering with evidence
Description: Tampering with evidence with intent to mislead the Court or any person authorized by law to investigate or try an offence
Punishment: Imprisonment for 3 years or fine or both

Title: Assaulting or hindering public servant on duty in suppressing riot, etc.
Description: Assaulting or hindering a public servant on duty in suppressing a riot, assault or affray
Punishment: Imprisonment for 3 years or fine or both

Title: Wantonly obstructing public servant in discharge of public functions
Description: Wantonly resisting or obstructing a public servant in the discharge of his public functions
Punishment: Imprisonment for 6 months or fine or both

Title: Affray
Description: Using force or violence, or threatening to use force or violence, in any public place, in a manner likely to cause a reasonable apprehension of violence
Punishment: Imprisonment for 3 months or fine or both

Title: Rioting
Description: Joining or continuing in an assembly of three or more persons riotously and unlawfully assembled
Punishment: Imprisonment for 3 years or fine or both

Title: Moving in procession armed
Description: Going armed with any deadly weapon to or being armed with any deadly weapon at, an unlawful assembly
Punishment: Imprisonment for 3 years or fine or both

Title: Injuring or defiling a place of worship
Description: Injuring or defiling a place of worship or any object held sacred by any class of persons
Punishment: Imprisonment for 2 years or fine or both

Title: Trespass on burial places
Description: Trespassing on any place of human burial and doing any thing which tends to insult the religious feelings of any class of persons
Punishment: Imprisonment for 2 years or fine or both

Title: Outraging the modesty of a woman
Description: Intentionally insulting the modesty of a woman
Punishment: Imprisonment for 3 years or fine or both

Title: Indecent assault on a woman
Description: Making an assault on a woman with intent to dishonour her, otherwise than by an unchaste act or by compelling her to marry him or any other person
Punishment: Imprisonment for 10 years and fine

Title: Kidnapping or abducting any person
Description: Kidnapping or abducting any person
Punishment: Imprisonment for 7 years and fine

Title: Wrongfully confining any person
Description: Wrongfully confining any person for three or more days
Punishment: Imprisonment for 7 years and fine

Title: Abusing children or causing them unnecessary suffering
Description: Intentionally subjecting a child to physical or mental torture or pain or abusing a child
Punishment: Imprisonment for 3 years or fine or both

Title: Neglecting minor for whom he is responsible
Description: Wilfully neglecting any minor under the age of sixteen of whom he has the charge or care
Punishment: Imprisonment for 2 years or fine or both

Title: Bigamy
Description: Whoever, having a husband or wife, marries another person during the lifetime of such husband or wife
Punishment: Imprisonment for 7 years and fine

Title: Cruelty to animals
Description: If any person cruelly subjects any animal to any pain or suffering, the penalty shall be imprisonment for one month or fine of ten thousand rupees, or both
Punishment: Imprisonment for 1 month or fine of ten thousand rupees, or both

Title: Entering house-trespass by night
Description: Knowingly entering or being in the dwelling-house of another person, or any building used as a dwelling-house, with intent to commit an offence therein, or having entered with such intent, remain therein
Punishment: Imprisonment for 2 years or fine or both

Title: House-trespass
Description: Knowingly entering or being in any building, or enclosure used as a place for keeping property, or for holding animals, or for manufacturing or carrying on any business, without lawful excuse
Punishment: Imprisonment for 3 months or fine or both

Title: Lurking house-trespass or house-breaking
Description: Lurking house-trespass or house-breaking by night
Punishment: Imprisonment for 7 years and fine

Title: Breaking out of confinement
Description: Breaking out of lawful confinement
Punishment: Imprisonment for 7 years or fine or both

Title: Offering resistance to or escaping by force when arrested
Description: Offering resistance to, or escaping by force from, the lawful custody of a public servant
Punishment: Imprisonment for 3 years or fine or both

Title: Harboring an escaped person
Description: Harboring or concealing an escaped person
Punishment: Imprisonment for 1 year or fine or both

Title: Furnishing false information
Description: Furnishing false information to a public servant or to another person authorized to receive such information
Punishment: Imprisonment for 3 months or fine or both

Title: Omission to give notice or information to public servant of offences
Description: Omitting to give notice or information to a public servant of any offence committed in his presence, if he were bound by law to give such notice
Punishment: Imprisonment for 6 months or fine or both

Title: Omission to assist public servant when required to do so
Description: Omitting to assist a public servant when lawfully required to do so
Punishment: Imprisonment for 3 months or fine or both

Title: Failure to provide assistance during riots, affrays, etc.
Description: Failing to assist a public servant in suppressing a riot, affray or assault, when lawfully required to do so
Punishment: Imprisonment for 3 months or fine or both

Title: Refusing to take oath as juror or witness
Description: Refusing to take oath as a juror or witness, or to answer any lawful question
Punishment: Imprisonment for 3 months or fine or both

Title: Refusing to answer questions by public servant lawfully authorized to ask questions
Description: Refusing to answer questions lawfully put by a public servant lawfully empowered to ask them
Punishment: Imprisonment for 3 months or fine or both

Title: Neglecting duty as regards fire or pestilence
Description: Negligently omitting to do what he is legally bound to do, with intent to danger life, safety, or health of the public
Punishment: Imprisonment for 6 months or fine or both

Title: Malignant act likely to spread infection of disease dangerous to life
Description: Maliciously doing any act which is likely to spread the infection of disease dangerous to life
Punishment: Imprisonment for 2 years or fine or both

Title: Disobedience to quarantine rule
Description: Disobeying any rule or direction lawfully made or given by any public servant as such
Punishment: Imprisonment for 6 months or fine or both

Title: Rash and negligent act likely to endanger human life or safety
Description: Doing any rash or negligent act or omitting to do any act which he is legally bound to do, if the act or omission is likely to endanger human life, safety, or health
Punishment: Imprisonment for 6 months or fine or both

Title: Driving vehicle in public way to the danger of the public
Description: Driving any vehicle on any public way recklessly or negligently, or at a speed or in a manner which is dangerous to the public
Punishment: Imprisonment for 6 months or fine or both

Title: Drunkenness in public places
Description: In any public place, being drunk, or behaving in a disorderly or indecent manner while drunk
Punishment: Imprisonment for 24 hours or fine of ten rupees, or both

Title: Obstructing public way with intent to cause annoyance
Description: Obstructing any public way, or rendering it inaccessible, without lawful excuse
Punishment: Imprisonment for 1 month or fine of two hundred rupees, or both

Title: Exposing an obscene book, print, etc., for sale or public view
Description: Selling or exposing for sale or to public view, any obscene book, pamphlet, paper, drawing, painting, engraving, figure, or image
Punishment: Imprisonment for 3 months or fine of two thousand rupees, or both

Title: Lewd acts in public places
Description: Committing any lewd act in any public place, or in any place intended for use by, or resorted to by, the public
Punishment: Imprisonment for 3 months or fine of two hundred rupees, or both

Title: Sale of noxious food or drink
Description: Selling, or offering for sale, any noxious food or drink, or adulterated food or drink, injurious to health
Punishment: Imprisonment for 6 months or fine of one thousand rupees, or both

Title: Negligence as to fire or combustible matter
Description: Negligently taking fire or any combustible matter in or near any place where it is likely to cause mischief
Punishment: Imprisonment for 6 months or fine of five hundred rupees, or

Title: Continuing nuisance after notice
Description: Keeping any disorderly or common gaming house, or a house for the purpose of smoking opium, or of using any other intoxicating or narcotic drug
Punishment: Imprisonment for 3 months or fine of two hundred rupees, or both

Title: Disclosing matters of evidence given in secret
Description: Disclosing the contents of any document which has been produced in evidence in a judicial proceeding
Punishment: Imprisonment for 2 years or fine or both

Title: Giving or fabricating false evidence in a judicial proceeding
Description: Giving or fabricating false evidence in any stage of a proceeding in any Court
Punishment: Imprisonment for 7 years or fine or both

Title: Using in evidence document known to be forged
Description: Using in evidence any document which the person knows or has reason to believe to be forged
Punishment: Imprisonment for 2 years or fine or both

Title: Obstructing justice by destroying evidence
Description: Intentionally destroying or suppressing any document or evidence which is or may be required in evidence in a judicial proceeding
Punishment: Imprisonment for 2 years or fine or both

Title: False charge of offence made with intent to cause injury
Description: Fabricating a false charge of any offence against any person, knowing or believing such charge to be false
Punishment: Imprisonment for 3 years or fine or both

Title: Perjury
Description: Intentionally giving false evidence on oath, whether such evidence is given in a Court or before any person authorized by law to receive evidence
Punishment: Imprisonment for 7 years or fine or both

Title: Fabricating false evidence to cause death
Description: Fabricating false evidence with intent to cause any person to be sentenced to death
Punishment: Imprisonment for life

Title: Intentional omission to bring offender to justice
Description: Public servant intentionally omitting to bring to justice any person whom he knows or has reason to believe to be guilty of an offence
Punishment: Imprisonment for 2 years or fine or both

Title: Intentional omission to inform public servant of offences committed
Description: Public servant intentionally omitting to inform his superior officer of any offence committed in his presence, if he is bound by law to give such information
Punishment: Imprisonment for 6 months or fine or both

Title: Taking gift by a public servant for official act
Description: Accepting or obtaining, or agreeing to accept or obtain, from any person, for himself or for any other person, any undue gratification or reward
Punishment: Imprisonment for 7 years or fine or both

Title: Offering undue gratification to a public servant
Description: Offering any undue gratification to a public servant, as motive or reward for doing or refraining from doing any official act
Punishment: Imprisonment for 3 years or fine or both

Title: Inciting or attempting to incite public servant to commit offence
Description: Instigating or attempting to instigate a public servant to commit any offence
Punishment: Imprisonment for 2 years or fine or both

Title: Misrepresenting public servant's power or intention
Description: Knowingly making any false or fraudulent representation as to the power or position of a public servant or as to his ability to do or cause to be done anything which such public servant cannot do or cause to be done
Punishment: Imprisonment for 2 years or fine or both

Title: False statement in declaration which is by law receivable as evidence
Description: Making, in any declaration which is by law receivable as evidence, any statement which he knows or believes to be false
Punishment: Imprisonment for 3 years or fine or both

Title: Abetment of false statement in declaration which is by law receivable as evidence
Description: Abetting the making, in any declaration which is by law receivable as evidence, of any statement which he knows or believes to be false
Punishment: Imprisonment for 3 years or fine or both

Title: Fraudulently or dishonestly inducing delivery of property
Description: Intentionally inducing any person to deliver any property to himself or any other person or to enter into or make any contract, by means of any false representation
Punishment: Imprisonment for 7 years or fine or both

Title: Dishonestly inducing delivery of property
Description: Dishonestly inducing any person to deliver any property to himself or any other person or to enter into or make any contract, by means of any deceitful practice
Punishment: Imprisonment for 3 years or fine or both

Title: Cheating by personation
Description: Cheating by falsely personating another person
Punishment: Imprisonment for 3 years or fine or both

Title: Obtaining property by inducing belief of false authority
Description: Obtaining any property by inducing a false belief that the offender is lawfully authorized to demand such property
Punishment: Imprisonment for 3 years or fine or both

Title: Fraudulently causing delivery of property
Description: Fraudulently causing a false delivery of property to be made by a servant or agent
Punishment: Imprisonment for 2 years or fine or both

Title: Taking insufficient security for money
Description: Taking or accepting from any person, any other security than is provided by law, for any loan or debt or other obligation
Punishment: Imprisonment for 1 year or fine or fine (amount equal to the value of the loan)

Title: Issuing or signing cheques without sufficient funds
Description: Issuing or signing a cheque on a bank or by any other drawer payable to order payable in the future of such a date that when it becomes due the drawer will not have sufficient funds in such bank or in the hands of such drawee to meet the payment in full
Punishment: Imprisonment for 2 years or fine or both

Title: Stopping payment of cheque when account has sufficient funds
Description: By order stopping payment of a cheque drawn on a bank or by any other drawer for which payment sufficient money already exists in his account
Punishment: Imprisonment for 2 years or fine or both

Title: Dishonoring bills of exchange
Description: Dishonoring a bill of exchange which he has accepted
Punishment: Imprisonment for 2 years or fine or both

Title: Abetment of dishonoring bills of exchange
Description: Abetting the dishonouring of a bill of exchange which has been accepted
Punishment: Imprisonment for 2 years or fine or both

Title: Fraudulently making false promise with intent to cause injury
Description: Fraudulently or deceitfully causing any person to do or omit to do anything which he is not legally bound to do or omit
Punishment: Imprisonment for 1 year or fine or both

Title: Causing death by negligence
Description: Causing the death of any person by doing any rash or negligent act not amounting to culpable homicide
Punishment: Imprisonment for 2 years or fine or both

Title: Attempt to commit culpable homicide
Description: Attempting to commit culpable homicide
Punishment: Imprisonment for 7 years or fine or both

Title: Letting loose dangerous animals
Description: Letting loose any animal for mischievous purposes, or in any manner likely to cause mischief
Punishment: Imprisonment for 6 months or fine of two hundred rupees, or both

Title: Negligently causing bodily harm
Description: Causing bodily harm to any person by doing any rash or negligent act
Punishment: Imprisonment for 1 year or fine of five hundred rupees, or both

Title: Simple imprisonment
Description: Simple imprisonment for a term which may extend to two years.
Punishment: Imprisonment for up to 2 years

Title: Imprisonment of either description
Description: Imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to ten years.
Punishment: Imprisonment for up to 10 years

Title: Solitary confinement
Description: Solitary confinement for any term not exceeding three months.
Punishment: Solitary confinement for up to 3 months

Title: Fine
Description: Fine.
Punishment: Fine of varying amounts depending on the offense
